title: Cant access events board on my PC
body:
Hi Riot, 
  I have been wanting to sign up for events so I can compete and learn more strategies for the game but on my PC I cant log in to the lol events board and it just keeps pulling up a blank page :/ any help for this would be great! Hope you guys can help. {{champion:427}}

replies.body:
Can you try using a different browser or clearing the cache for your current browser using [this link](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies)?

If you still have issues, please send me the URL for the exact page you're trying to access.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=FUUQzpik,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-06T22:38:59.332+0000)
>
> Can you try using a different browser or clearing the cache for your current browser using [this link](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies)?
> 
> If you still have issues, please send me the URL for the exact page you're trying to access.

Hey I cleared it but no luck :/ heres the link im trying to reach ill try it on my other browsers though. http://events.na.leagueoflegends.com/

Hmm.. Can you try visiting the [League home page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com) first. then try visiting the link for the events page afterwards? Sometimes this can resolve the issue.

If you still encounter issues, please [send me a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) of the page you're seeing, along with the showing the current URL at the error.
